channel.title: How do I make NPC's move?
channel.description:
Okay I understand what npcID, coordX, CoordY, Height, WalkType, and Description mean.
What I don't understand, like a lot of other users is the RangeX1 RangeY1 RangeX2 and RangeY2
If someone can explain it to me it would be greatly appreciated.
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 494 2721 3495 0 0 0 0 0 2 Banker
so lets say I have this banker at these coords.. how do i make him move around the bank? Like does RangeX1-RangeY1 mean I have to get the coords of the South East corner and RangeX2-RangeY2 the opposite corner? Making the NPC walk anywhere between those coords?
Please help me understand.

item.title: How do I make NPC's move?
item.dc:creator: @jktestman jktestman
item.description:
@jktestman wrote:

someone should help him

Read full topic
